resources.string:
Here are some explanations about this application. 


Smart Herald is an application involving a few companies. 

You have probably downloaded this application at the request of a company. 


Swipe left to continue

On the Home screen, you have a button "+" . With this button, you access the search page you can find the company you want to follow . 


Swipe left to continue

You can create an account or log in as Anonymous account. 


The benefit of the account is that you can manage your account and read the news on multiple devices. Whether on computers, tablets or smartphones. 


Please close this window to select your account.
